website_summaries.verdict: Steve Madden heightens up street style with the Wanda sneaker, which comes in at a reasonable price of $99.95. Many reviewers adored the shoe's stylish yet practical look. It was also found to be very comfortable, ideal for the winter season due to its warmth. Wearers observed that it had high-quality construction, along with a versatile style that led to them receiving many compliments. All in all, the kicks were well-received by plenty of purchasers.
pros: The Steve Madden Wanda is affordable
More than a handful of purchasers were pleased with the price
A lot of buyers observed that the sneaker is cute, stylish, and cool
One user added that it was fashionable yet functional
A couple of reviewers imparted that they would recommend the shoe
According to many commenters, the Steve Madden Wanda is comfortable
These kicks are of high quality, lauded several wearers
Some buyers mentioned that they got many compliments for wearing this model
A few purchasers agreed that the Steve Madden Wanda was ideal for the winter season as it offered warmth
The sneaker goes with anything, praised several users
cons: According to a few reviewers, the kicks had a tight fit and were more suited for those with narrow or regular feet

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Shoes, TERRIBLE Quality
customer_reviews.text: 1. Lining material is very cheap, synthetic, material which has been poorly glued into the shoe (glue is showing and comes out) 2. The stitching of the fabric are such that the cheap synthetic fibres through the stitching of the shoe 3. The zippers are non-functional (a 30 year old adult male cannot easily zip and unzip them) (when they’re not even on a foot) 4. I would not feel comfortable spending $20 on these and have been sorely disappointed with the lack of quality and craftsmanship on these brand-name shoes. 4. I would not feel comfortable spending $20 on these and have been sorely disappointed with the lack of quality and craftsmanship on these brand-name shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mim

customer_reviews.title: Warm stylish boot
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super warm and comfy stylish and great for winter. When I got them they felt a little small but quickly stretched a little and conformed perfectly to my foot after wearing twice.
customer_reviews.author: Bon Bon

customer_reviews.title: Love love love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these shoes and get so many compliments on them. I am a sometimes a 7, sometimes 7.5 depending on the shoe so I ordered these in a 7. They fit perfect even though the shoes have fur inside them. With a sick and the fur, they still fit at a 7. Awesome shoes and match with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality inside and out, has a great design and I wear them every day, sunny/rain or snow! I got the usual size and it fit just right, it’s just a bit narrow (for using a thicker sock). Would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Gabianza

customer_reviews.title: So cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I got so many compliments the first time I wore. I wore them all day long and my feet never tired. I wore without socks and my feet did not sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Kellye Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This style is perfect for me. They are very comfortable and wear well for everyday. This style is cozy with the inner fluff added for colder weather.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: After looking for a pair of sneaker wedges for a while, I decided on these. I'm so glad I did! The fit is perfect, the quality great, and they are super comfortable while giving you a few extra inches. The lining inside makes them warm too! I'd definitely recommend--you can dress them up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Very comfortable. Have gotten lots of compliments. And you can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: LettyAnn

customer_reviews.title: They are lined with shearing
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize they had shearing inside only a fall sneaker
customer_reviews.author: Flossie wolfsperger

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable AF
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! So cute and comfy. One of my favorite pairs of all time. The fuzzy liner feels like slippers, yet they are very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy these now!
customer_reviews.text: I wear these everyday since I got them, and they were such a steal!! I encourage you to buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable kept my feet warm, whenever I wear them I get a lot of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Imdickie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes , they are so comfy and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Zandile

customer_reviews.title: Luv'em
customer_reviews.text: I buy this shoe every year...different color. I love them but then again I'm love almost any Steve Madden shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Anika

customer_reviews.title: She likes them
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend liked them said they were comfortable and fit well
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Sander

customer_reviews.title: Love my Maddens
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and comfy, keep my feet nice and warm..... love them
customer_reviews.author: MARGIE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort stylish
customer_reviews.text: So comfy! Fur i side is so warm and cozy
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre O.

product_meta.title: Steve Madden Women's Wanda Sneaker
product_meta.description: With a faux fur-lined suede upper and supportive rubber sole, the wanda sneaker promises to treat your feet right! stepping into this snuggly style couldn't be easier, thanks to its convenient side zipper entry.
